author: Brian Kami
comment: Like the app, been wishing for something liked this. My only issue with it is that I have to keep opening it on my HTC M8 for the gallery to appear on the SW3. I couldn't dig deeper to find out why, it looks like this happens when my phone sleeps. Edit: Dev fixed the sleep issue. Thanks a mill.

reply.author: Suresh Kheni
reply.content: Your HTC Phone Kills the Service Running on Mobile when Sleeps that is why ....Will try to Fix in New Version

author: Mike R
comment: Would love to make folders on "My Watch" so when I save pictures  I can separate them.  That way I can show specific pics to specific people and they don't to see all my pics.  Great app!  Must have for moto 360!
title: Worth it!

author: Kenneth Carnie
comment: Initially, it takes forever for the images to load onto the watch. If you delete any files off of the phone it will almost reset the database on which the app loads and you have to uninstall/reinstall the app every time. (I'm using a nexus 5 16gb lollipop 5.0.1 with an lg g watch running Android wear lollipop and with only 16gb my photos are in the cloud only. there is no scrolling between images. I would love to see a feature where you can send a picture in a text/mms from the share menu. Thanks!!!

reply.author: Suresh Kheni
reply.content: Please try By Re-installing app and make sure Mobile Connected
